title: What is the best Twenty One Pilots song, and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: In my personal opinion of listening to all their albums and songs for the past 5 years I would have to go with Taxi Cab (From the Self Titled album). It just does such a good job at telling a story in a short song and it just gets better every time I listen. There’s so much storytelling packed in the song that every time you listen you’ll notice another part you didn’t quite notice before.
